hero.name: Avin Zhang
hero.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
hero.subtitle: Go/Java | Distributed Architecture | High Concurrency Systems | Microservices Expert
hero.description: 11 years of full-stack architecture and development experience, proficient in microservices, distributed systems, high-concurrency and high-availability architecture design, with global service deployment and operations experience. Rich experience in business abstraction, component encapsulation, toolchain construction, and complex system refactoring.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Technology-driven, pursuing excellence
about.description: 11 years of backend architecture and development experience with deep technical engineering capabilities. Multiple times improved development efficiency and code quality through architecture abstraction, middleware encapsulation, and toolchain construction. Rich practical experience covering recruitment, finance, e-commerce, ERP and other domains. Led system construction from 0 to 1 and technical team management. Active technology explorer familiar with cloud-native and middleware ecosystems, with AI integration practical experience and contributions to open-source community.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Looking forward to collaborating
contact.description: If you have any project requirements or collaboration intentions, please feel free to contact me anytime. I will respond to your message within 24 hours.
contact.wechat_tip: Scan the QR code above to add me as a friend
